quote: Give a man a fish, and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, and you feed him for a lifetime.
author: proverb

quote: First solve the problem. Then write the code
author: John Johnson

quote: If you want to build a ship, don't drum up the men to gather wood, divide the work and give orders. Instead, teach them to yearn for the vast and endless sea
author: Anotine de Saint-Exupery
